statements: SELECT id, player_id, action_type, action_timestamp, decision FROM player_actions;
SELECT player_id, decision, action_timestamp, action_type, id FROM player_actions;
SELECT action_type, player_id, id, decision, action_timestamp FROM player_actions;
SELECT id, action_timestamp, action_type, player_id, decision FROM player_actions;
SELECT decision, action_timestamp, player_id, id, action_type FROM player_actions;
SELECT * FROM player_actions WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) as total_actions FROM player_actions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_actions > 5;
SELECT player_id, decision FROM player_actions WHERE action_type = 'attack' OR action_type = 'defend' ORDER BY player_id ASC, action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM player_actions WHERE decision IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, action_type FROM player_actions WHERE action_timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2023-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM PlayerActions;
SELECT player_id, action_time FROM PlayerActions WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT player_id, action_time FROM PlayerActions WHERE action_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, action_description FROM PlayerActions ORDER BY action_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, action_time, action_description FROM PlayerActions WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY action_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerActions ORDER BY action_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, action_description FROM PlayerActions WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT player_id, MAX(action_time) AS latest_action_time FROM PlayerActions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM PlayerActions JOIN PlayerDecisions ON PlayerActions.player_id = PlayerDecisions.player_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_actions FROM PlayerActions GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_actions > 3;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, last_login FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_name, action_name, action_timestamp FROM player_actions WHERE action_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT player_name, decision_name FROM players JOIN player_decisions ON players.player_id = player_decisions.player_id ORDER BY decision_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_name, last_login FROM players WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_login ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.player_name, COUNT(pa.action_id) AS num_actions FROM players p JOIN player_actions pa ON p.player_id = pa.player_id GROUP BY p.player_name HAVING num_actions > 3 ORDER BY num_actions DESC;
SELECT pd.decision_name, COUNT(pd.decision_id) AS num_decisions FROM player_decisions pd GROUP BY pd.decision_name ORDER BY num_decisions ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM player_actions pa LEFT JOIN players p ON pa.player_id = p.player_id WHERE p.player_level < 5 ORDER BY p.player_name ASC, pa.action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_level < 3;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT player_name, action_name, experience_score FROM players p JOIN experiences e ON p.player_id = e.player_id JOIN actions a ON a.action_id = e.action_id;
SELECT player_name, decision_name, decision_description FROM players p JOIN experiences e ON p.player_id = e.player_id JOIN decisions d ON d.decision_id = e.decision_id WHERE e.experience_score > 8;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY session_start DESC;
SELECT player_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM player_actions WHERE action_type = 'login';
SELECT player_id, decision_id, decision_type FROM player_decisions WHERE decision_type = 'approve';
SELECT * FROM personalization_data WHERE player_id = 456;
SELECT session_id, score_value FROM game_scores WHERE player_id = 789 AND session_id = 101;
SELECT player_id, action_type FROM player_actions ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, decision_type FROM player_decisions WHERE decision_type = 'Win' AND decision_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, preference_type FROM personalization_data WHERE preference_type = 'theme' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, session_id FROM game_sessions WHERE session_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, score_value FROM game_scores WHERE score_value > 100 ORDER BY score_value DESC;
